alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 3:04PM CDT until August 16 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 303 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Vernon, or 12 miles east of Citronelle, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bay Minette, Creola, Stockton, Axis, Mount Vernon, I65 And AL 225 and Movico. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
